page.title: 13My Holiday.
page.content: In 1984 I went on holiday to the South of France. We stayed in a mobile home on a camp site. There was an outdoor swimming pool. I went to it nearly every day with my brother. I learned to dive there. When Mum and Dad came to watch me they sat at the bar. A bar is a place where you can buy drinks. There is a fence around the pool to separate the bar from the pool. There were two pools, a little one for the babies and non-swimmers. David and me went in the big one. There was a dance floor near the bar and every night I went to a disco there. One day David and me hired BMX bikes. Some days the family went to the beach. By Jane Boyce, Age 9.
